price: (Onipa) no a wayε nyame aka Nyankopͻn ho no. Monto no ntwene asotwee denden no mu.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fī al-ʿadhābi al-shadīdi
